doc.name: ModelDirectory
doc.description: A directory of open models. An instance of this class is contained by a Configuration. Each open model is represented by an instance of Effigy. An effigy represents the model data. It contains a string attribute named "identifier" with a string value that uniquely identifies the model. A typical choice (which depend on the configuration) is the canonical URL for a MoML file that describes the model. An effigy also contains all open instances of Tableau associated with the model.
doc.author: Steve Neuendorffer and Edward A. Lee
